p: For nanoencapsulated oils, the diameter size is usually between 100 and 1000 nm [ 10, 16, 35, 37, 38, 83, 85, 87] or less than 100 nm [ 84, 86– 88]. Diameters larger than 1000 nm were found by Ricaurte et al. [ 10]; those authors reported diameters between 163 and 2268 nm using the microfluidization method and whey protein as a wall material in the nanoencapsulation of HOPO.
